name: Marcotte Sillage
title: Emilie: Marcotte Sillage
in_play_description:
The character to which this is attached has their Physical DMG dealt converted to Dendro DMG.
After Emilie, who has this card equipped, uses her Normal Attack: Your highest level Lumidouce Case can immediately take action 1 time. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Emilie to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
The character to which this is attached has their Physical DMG dealt converted to Dendro DMG.
After Emilie, who has this card equipped, uses her Normal Attack: Your highest level Lumidouce Case can immediately take action 1 time. (Once per Round)
(You must have Emilie in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
